mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mainpage_article1 (project_id,article_id,form_name,writeform1_content,writer,regDate,file_name,img_name) VALUES ( 1 ,article_seq.nextval , #{form_name}, #{writeform1_content}, 'tester', sysdate, #{file_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO mainpage_article2 (project_id, article_id, form_name, writeform2_title, writeform2_content, writeform2_latlng, writer, regDate, file_name, img_name) VALUES ( 1 ,article_seq.nextval , #{form_name}, #{writeForm2_title}, #{writeForm2_content}, #{writeForm2_latlng, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'tester', sysdate, #{file_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO mainpage_article3 ( project_id, article_id, form_name, writer, regDate, file_name, img_name, writeForm3_title, writeForm3_status, writeForm3_workersName, writeForm3_start_date, writeForm3_end_date, writeForm3_progress, writeForm3_order, writeForm3_content ) VALUES ( 1, article_seq.nextval, #{form_name}, 'tester3', sysdate, #{file_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_workersName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_progress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO mainpage_article4 ( project_id, article_id, form_name, writer, regDate, writeForm4_title, writeForm4_start_date, writeForm4_start_time, writeForm4_end_date, writeForm4_end_time, writeForm4_alarm_time, writeForm4_content, writeForm4_latlng ) VALUES ( 1, article_seq.nextval, #{form_name}, 'tester3', sysdate, #{writeForm4_title}, #{writeForm4_start_date}, #{writeForm4_start_time}, #{writeForm4_end_date}, #{writeForm4_end_time}, #{writeForm4_alarm_time}, #{writeForm4_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_latlng, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
